Toolbox to facilitate the re-use of national and regional data from Land Parcel Identification System¶

Each year, millions of croplands data are saved in national and regional Land Parcel Identification Systems(LPIS) to benefit from the Common Agricole Policy. This toolbox, called Classificrops (Classification + crops) and developed in python (version 3.9.12) was built to facilitate the re-use of those data. For now, 3 tools are available : converter, optimal_threshold and view_stats. To know more about it, please read the documentation. This documentation is dedicated to users that have some basic knowledges on python coding and LPIS data.

  1. Classificrops’s documentation

    Classificrops helps to convert one LPIS classification toward the Indicative Crops Classification(ICC) made by the FAO, in a semi-automated way.

  2. Agrivolution

    Agrivolution is a croplands statistics viewer that allow to view shared statistics in Occitania and Catalonia.

  • 1. Classificrops’s documentation
